item.description:
Enneagram Basic Workshop for Singles
Learn about the 9 Enneagram types in depth, what core type you are, personal growth for each type and how to relate to all 9 types. Herb acts out the 9 types with hats and songs. Lots of fun and insight about yourself and those important to you.

 

7:30-10pm

$40, sliding scale to $20

 

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is one of the top Enneagram teachers around. He's led over 2000 Enneagram workshops in the last 20 years to hundreds of groups and organizations and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram. He is a relationship coach and therapist. He has worked with thousands of people over the last 31 years in self-understanding and bridging differences. He is also the author of Herb's Tips for Living at www.herbstipsforliving.com.


www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com

781 648 3737
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.why: Because this is the best system to understand people. If you haven't been in a while, come as a refresher.
item.name: Enneagram Workshop
